solution_line_template: Maci pays {num_blue_pens} * ${cost_blue_pen} = $<<{num_blue_pens}*{cost_blue_pen}={cost_blue_pens}>>{cost_blue_pens} for the blue pens.
She pays {num_red_pens}*${cost_red_pen_each} = $<<{num_red_pens}*{cost_red_pen_each}={cost_red_pens}>>{cost_red_pens} for the red pens.
To buy all the pens she needs, Maci pays ${cost_red_pens}+${cost_blue_pens}= $<<{cost_red_pens}+{cost_blue_pens}={total_cost}>>{total_cost}
